text: The President of the Republic of Sierra Leone is the head of state and the head of government of Sierra Leone, as well as the commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces. As the head of the executive branch of the Sierra Leone government, the president implements laws passed by parliament. The president heads a Cabinet of ministers, which must be approved by the Parliament. The president is the most powerful, and the most influential person in the Government of Sierra Leone. ==See also== *List of colonial governors of Sierra Leone *List of heads of state of Sierra Leone *List of heads of government of Sierra Leone ==Other websites== *
title: President of Sierra Leone
